content: double sided hat by jackie henderson this double thick hat is knitted as one long tube in the round and then one side placed inside the other for a double thick hat that can be reversible or decorated with a pom pom this pattern uses the magic loop method to knit in the round but if you like you can use double pointed needles to start and end the tube and switch to a short circular needle for the body of the hat if you are new to magic loop a complete video showing this method can be viewed with this link https //youtu be/q6cdootgofm video link to a complete tutorial on how to knit this hat https //youtu be/0yu25kkqpro yarn worsted weight hobby lobby brand yarn bee easygoing colors used frosting sage egyptian sandstone cottage rose © jackie henderson yardage approx 275 yards total needle us size 8 long circular needle for knitting magic loop gauge 4 x4 = 17 sts 26 row final dimensions sizes small/medium large abbreviations p = purl k = knit m1r = make one right increase m1l = make one left increase ssk = slip slip knit decrease k2tog = knit two together decrease pm = place marker sm = slip marker round s = round s st s = stitch es pattern with color a cast on 13 stitches join to work in the round with magic loop ending with 12 stitches round 1 knit all stitches round 2 k1 m1l k1 m1r k1 pm k1 m1l k1 m1r k1 end of front half of stitches k1 m1l k1 m1r k1 pm k1 m1l k1 m1r k1 end of round round 3 knit all round 4 k1 m1l knit to one st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l knit to one st before end of front side m1r k1 turn to back half of stitches k1 m1l knit to one st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l knit to one st before end of round m1r k1 repeat rnds 3 and 4 until 76 84 stitches total on needle crown complete repeat round 3 until piece measures 6 5 7 inches from top of crown © jackie henderson if desired switch to new colors every few row or as desired for striped effect on the top half of hat switch to color b or color being used for cuff and inside of hat round 1 knit all repeat round 1 until hat measures 14 15 inches from top of crown decrease rnds round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before end of front side
